name: redistillation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of distilling a liquid again (= making it stronger or purer by heating until it changes to a gas, and then cooling so that it changes back into a liquid), for a second, third, etc. time: The alcohol is collected for redistillation. The process of re-distillation is the most convenient and least expensive for recovering the oil.
More examplesFewer examplesRectification by redistillation continues until a water-alcohol solution of 95.6% Alc.Vol. is achieved.Preparations of such compounds are purified by methods such as recrystallisation or re-distillation, before they are marketed.Simple redistillation in glass is not sufficient to correct the toxicity of the ordinary distilled water.
